about_the_game:
Your Story: Games with Death - is an interactive text quest in the "Choose Your Own Adventure" genre, where you are the creator of the plot, choosing your path, and every decision you make can lead to greatness or end in tragedy.

    The text quest tells the story of a young adventurer during the Middle Ages, who strives to escape from his hometown and go in search of adventure in unknown lands, full of secrets and mysteries, as well as deadly dangers.

    Destiny is predetermined and death is already waiting for you, but do you have enough strength to change your destiny, rewriting history and changing the ending. Here everything can be changed and only you will know what awaits you at the end of the road. You have a chance to play with death by your own rules, bypassing its traps and choosing your path.

Your Story: Games with Death is not just a visual novel, it is a path where you decide where it will lead. This is your story, created by you. It is up to you to decide what it will be: a heroic saga that bards will sing about or a quiet end, around the corner of a tavern.

    Live the life of an adventurer whose insatiable thirst for discovery leads him across the endless seas in search of a better life. Travel through dense jungles, where every bush can hide a deadly danger. Make your way through ancient ruins, where the shadows of the past come to life, and the walls whisper forgotten secrets. Make a fortune or choose the path of a wanderer. In this world, every step you take is a game on the edge of life and death. Make a mistake and the abyss will swallow you up

    In the world of Your Story: Games with Death, life is a game where fate never leaves you without a choice. Will you be able to pass all the tests and unravel all the mysteries? Or will you die without finding the answers? Only you decide what your path will be.

    Your choice is the key to everything. A world of over 2,000 events awaits you, affecting your story in every way possible, trying to prevent you from finishing it. There are over 200 ways to die, which will not give you the opportunity to solve all the secrets and mysteries. The path is always thorny: full of pain, loss and difficult decisions, but remember: you will have to pay for every action and often the price for it will be death

    Unexpected turns will keep you in suspense throughout the game, and death will follow you on your heels, waiting for you to stumble and fall into its embrace. Sometimes, what seems like the right decision leads to death. The world is cruel, and death is nothing more than a part of the game that allows you to learn from your mistakes. But victory is not always good, and defeat is not always evil. Everything is decided in a choice, the consequences of which cannot always be predicted.

    Three difficulty levels will create a unique atmosphere for you. The easy path will give you the pleasure of history, and the high level of difficulty will instill in you a constant fear of death and fear for your life, it will become a test for the most persistent. Only the lucky ones will be able to pass all the tests and reach the final.

    Are you ready to become a part of this visual novel and reveal the secrets of "Your Story: Games with Death"?

    Add the game to "Wishlist" and do not miss the chance to become a part of this fascinating story.
detailed_description:
Добавляйте игру в «Желаемое»

Add the game to your “Wishlist” and don’t miss the chance to create your own fascinating story.

name: Your Story: Games with Death

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0+ GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD5450 or better; 512 MB or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: A medieval text quest in the "Choose Your Own Adventure" genre, where each choice could be your last. Create your story with more than 2,000 events, 200 of which will prove fatal. In a world where death plays against you, can you outsmart it and write your own story?
supported_languages: English, Russian, Ukrainian, French, German, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Polish
